item.title: Export Chromatogram Consensus
item.description:
Export Chromatogram Consensus

To export consensus sequence use the C__onsensus tab of the Options Panel:

The following parameters are available:

Export to file - here you need to select path for the output file.

File format - format for the output file.

Keep gaps - set this parameter if the result consensus must keep gaps.

When you click on the Export button the consensus sequence will be exported into selected output file.
